channel.title: Caching on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Caching on David Moreno blog

item.title: Caching and optimization for WordPress talk
item.description: Continuing with my WordCamp NYC talks review, I’d like to point out the notes I took attending the talk Caching and Optimization for WordPress, by Jeremy Clarke. I believe this was a great topic to be covered for people who actively maintain WordPress installations and have to deal with upgrades, stability and reliability. However, I also think Jeremy took a much more basic approach for this topic the way it shouldn’t have to be.
